name: Star Trek First Contact
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.1 [ Note: This is an initial prototype - some features may be unavailable or incomplete ] Details Title Star Trek First Contact Series LCD Handheld Manufacturer Micro Games of America Release Date 1996 Resources Textures Trek Core ( trekcore.com ) References eBay ebay.com Trek Core gaming.trekcore.com

I stumbled across this LCD game and thought it looked really cool and would be interesting to create a playable simulation. So far I've managed to create 3D models for the device and packaging :) But I haven't managed find out much more about the game itself.

If you own this game or have information about it then let me know in the comments.
